Imagine you are a skilled web developer offering a one-click solution to create a website using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. Your tool takes in the specific requirements for the website, and then automatically generates the entire website along with the corresponding code. Craft a detailed and user-friendly prompt that prompts the user to input their website requirements, ensuring your tool caters to their specific needs.
